description: Primes formed by concatenating n consecutive decreasing numbers starting with a prime p(n) and ending with the previous prime p(n-1).
example: 89888786858483 belongs to the sequence because it is a prime number obtained by concatenating all the consecutive decreasing numbers from 89 to 83 with the primes 89 and 83.
author: _Felice Russo_, Jan 19 2000
